title: Genji
synopsis: Time-traveling lovers Katsumi and Sakura find themselves in the midst of Japan's medieval civil war between the Heike and Genji clans.
staff: [['Yasumura, Ryou', ['Director']], ['Fujiyama, Fusanobu', ['Sound Director']], ['Kouga, Yun', ['Original Creator']], ['Yamamoto, Masafumi', ['Animation Director']]]
